Class com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders.AssetBuilder

com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders

Class AssetBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders.AssetBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The parameters for configuring each type of asset for download.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HLSAssetBuilder, HSSAssetBuilder, MPDAssetBuilder
    public abstract class AssetBuilder<T> extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for the asset builders which use a builder pattern to create assets which will be queued for download using Download2Go. This is a templated class as different parameters need to be configured for some asset types.
